---
title: "Soil C:N Ratio Dashboard"
output: flexdashboard::flex_dashboard
runtime: shiny
---

```{r}
library(flexdashboard)
library(leaflet)
library(ggplot2)
library(dplyr)

# Sample data frame with location and C:N ratio
df <- data.frame(
  Latitude = c(37.7749, 34.0522, 40.7128, 41.8781, 29.7604),
  Longitude = c(-122.4194, -118.2437, -74.0060, -87.6298, -95.3698),
  C_N_Ratio = c(10, 15, 20, 12, 18)
)
```


-------------------------------------
## Map with Point Locations
-------------------------------------
Column {data-width=650}



```{r}

leaflet(df) %>%
  addTiles() %>%
  addCircleMarkers(~Longitude, ~Latitude, 
                   radius = ~C_N_Ratio / 2, 
                   popup = ~paste("C:N Ratio:", C_N_Ratio),
                   color = "red", fill = TRUE, fillOpacity = 0.7)
```


-------------------------------------
## Histogram of C:N Ratio
-------------------------------------

Column {data-width=350}



```{r}
ggplot(df, aes(x = C_N_Ratio)) +
  geom_histogram(binwidth = 5, fill = "blue", color = "black", alpha = 0.7) +
  labs(title = "Histogram of Soil Carbon to Nitrogen Ratio",
       x = "C:N Ratio",
       y = "Frequency") +
  theme_minimal()
```
